title: 2015년 Moon Lake Condominium Association v. Rbs Citizens 사건
summary: 미국 Michigan, MI 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Moon Lake Condominium Association v. Rbs Citizens. 판결일: 2015-11-12. 법원: Michigan Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Moon Lake Condominium Association v. Rbs Citizens
**판결일**: 2015-11-12
**법원**: Michigan Court of Appeals
**관할**: Michigan, MI


## 판결문 요약

                          STATE OF MICHIGAN

                            COURT OF APPEALS



MOON LAKE CONDOMINIUM                                              UNPUBLISHED
ASSOCIATION,                                                       November 12, 2015

              Plaintiff-Appellant,

v                                                                  No. 323576
                                                                   Oakland Circuit Court
RBS CITIZENS,                                                      LC No. 2013-137518-CH

              Defendant-Appellee,

and

LOUIS FOLTZ, OAKLAND COUNTY CLERK,
and T. LEE HOLDINGS,

              Defendants.


Before: STEPHENS, P.J., and CAVANAGH and MURRAY, JJ.

PER CURIAM.

       Plaintiff, Moon Lake Condominium Association, appeals as of right from an order
dismissing its action for surplus funds from a foreclosure sale of a condominium. We affirm.

       On appeal, plaintiff argues that dismissal was improper because it was not given notice of
defendant’s claim for the surplus proceeds. After de novo review of the trial court’s summary
dismissal decision, which was based on the interpretation of a statute, we disagree. See Johnson
v Recca, 492 Mich. 169, 173; 821 NW2d 520 (2012); Pontiac Sch Dist v Pontiac Ed Ass’n, 295
Mich. App. 147, 152; 811 NW2d 64 (2012).



       MCL 600.3252 governs the distribution of surplus proceeds following a foreclosure sale
and provides:

              If after any sale of real est...
